text: Everyone that I have met her are very friendly and helpful. Scheduling is a breeze. Less than 5 minute wait time. Mary Beth and her assistants are great. They are always nice, cheerful, and answer any questions that I have. I recommend them any chance I get.

Checking a patients entire body can be very uncomfortable if the caregiver isn't especially professional. Mary Beth made me feel comfortable. Her assistant Richard was also very kind and thoughtful as he worked with Mary Beth during my skin exam.  I am blessed to have them provide my Dermatology care.

Answered every question I had, and it was the most positive experience. I can't wait until I can go back.

resp.text: Hello, thank you so much for this positive review! We are thrilled to have earned it.

name: John Glenn
text: The visit was great.  Signs out front clearly identified the call in number and the staff explained the sign in process.  I did not have wait long to go inside and and I was seen by the Provider very quickly.  All my questions and concerns were addressed completely.  I highly recommend Inverness Dermatology; my recent visit was typical of all others I've had there.  Overall, a great experience.

resp.text: Thank you for the detailed review, John. We are happy to hear that you had a positive experience!

name: Whitney Holcomb
text: We were in and out in a timely manner. We were able to check in quickly. The doctor was very caring and listened to the issue.

name: Judy Antonio
text: She's  upbeat, attentive doesn't keep me waiting too long. She goes at her work efficiently and precisely.  Working together we have discovered 8 cancers on my hands and chest. You might say I think she's a life saver! Thank you Mary Beth for all you do for me!

name: Treasia Bennett
text: She was very thorough in her over all check of my body, answered my questions, interested in problem areas, sought solutions to resolve. She was very friendly and personable. I really liked her and will use her again. Thanks for asking.

name: Brent Cobb
text: Mary Beth is just fabulous. She is warm and friendly and we never feel rushed. She's just fun to visit with, and she truly cares about her patients.

text: Clear, concise, energetic and understanding. We have a plan for my daughter's acne and I feel good about future follow-ups.

She assists my daughter every two weeks and we couldn’t be happier with the results! Both of these people add so much knowledge and kindness to this dermatological office.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and high rating, Melton!

name: Dale Wisely
text: I went for medical dermatology. Office and PA Templin were friendly, helpful, and efficient. Perfect set-up for COVID safety. Got an effective evaluation, recommendations, and was out the door before my appt time was scheduled to begin. Will use again.

name: Smithfield HOA
text: My favorite Derm office! I see Mary Beth and really like being her patient.The front staff is very nice too which is very important! Thanks for being a great office! It is worth the hour drive.

text: Loved her! So patient and sweet!

resp.text: Hi, thank you so much for the positive review!

name: Lynda Ratliff
text: Some of these questions are not applicable yet. I did feel like the doctor came in, looked at the spot I came in for, quickly assessed, took a sample and sent me on my way. I kinda felt rushed out of there. But, the overall experience was very good...quick, fast ,easy. I do not have any idea what she was looking for when she took the sample because she was in and out of the room so quickly and did not really tell me.

resp.text: We appreciate the feedback, Lynda. We would like the opportunity to address your concern. Please call our office at your earliest convenience at 205-995-5575 and ask to speak with our office manager, Bonny.

name: Theresa Tate
text:
Mary Beth is one of the most pleasant individuals I have ever been around. She is so friendly and professional. She took time with me and did not rush. I have been rushed before when seen by a dermatologist. Will be using Mary Beth next time. My best to her with her career and her life.
Inverness Dermatology is very lucky and blessed to have her as a P A there.

I tried calling to schedule my appointment when I sat on hold for over 7 minutes multiple times without ever getting to speak to a person. Therefore, I scheduled my appointment online. When I arrived for my appointment they said I was not on the schedule but rather it was the following week and they said that happens often when booking online.
She added me to the schedule and it took an hour before I was taken back to a procedure room.

name: Melinda Boggs
text: Had a great experience with Kelli Toth recently. Took my 13 year old son in and she has gotten us on the road to a smooth face. She was thorough and very knowledge. Wait time was fast; was called back while we were still filling out paperwork. We'll be back and I would definitely recommend her.

name: Kathy Coari
text: Very respectful and thorough! Thank you for the excellent care.

resp.text: Hi Kathy, thank you for taking the time to leave us this positive review! Have a great day!

name: Summer Koontz
text:
***I am giving 4 starts for the front desk, cleanliness of the facility, and over all atmosphere. ***

I would recommend Advance Dermatology and I will continue to use them however, I will be switching providers. They front desk staff are always very nice and are very helpful. The girls up front have some of the best patient customer service I’ve seen in a providers office in a very long time.

Now as for the NP I saw she gets 1 Star.
Kelly NP really needs to slow down, take more time with her patients and to really listen to them. After waiting 45mins past my appointment time just to see her to only get 20mins of her time is very frustrating. If you don’t take the time to listen to your patients and rush through their visit your patients will never feel like your giving them 💯%. I value my time just as much as she values hers. As a patient when I tell you my symptoms as a Physician/NP you shouldn’t make me feel as if they are insignificant. If I tell you I don’t have certain symptoms then that means I don’t have them. If I tell you I use a certain product that is already dermatology recommended don’t disregard it just because it’s not a product you like or want to promote. Why would I want to continue to see you if you down grade my issue, try to force a product upon me and don’t value my time?

name: Barbara Petelinski
text: A very good visit with Dr. Kelli. She is very thorough explaining and answering all of my questions and concerns.

resp.text: Hello, thanks for taking the time to leave us positive feedback! Have a great day!

resp.text: Thank you for this great review, and have a fantastic day!

text: Kellie was amazing and after I had a near syncope episode due to my fear of needles, she sat with me until I felt better and made sure I got something to drink, i am already seeing my scars disappear and I can’t wait for my next appointment.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this positive review! Have a great day!

name: Patricia Gibbons
text: I saw Keller for the first time, she is very knowledgeable and listen to all the questions I had during my appointment.  I will see her again and have respect for all the employees, they were kind and professional.

name: ingrid speck
text: Very easy to get appointment.  Didn't have to wait weeks or months.  Staff very friendly.  Office procedures very organized with patient kiosks in waiting room to update info. or watch videos relating to dermatology.  Very current on technology and easy to use also (important to seniors!).  All in all a good experience.

name: Courtney Fox Osborne
text:
Great, local staff here! I’m battling the pandemic’s blemish breakout known as “mask-ne”😷;)...at the age of 40! Not part of my master plan:( But!-thanks to Kellie, it’s improving after 3 mos of prescribed treatment. Also helped that I switched to using a face ‘shield’ instead of mask to decrease skin irritations.👍

I like that this office is conveniently located in Daphne & offers lots of services under one roof: dermatologists for medical & Rx needs (skin cancer, acne, etc); estheticians for cosmetic needs (facials, peels, laser treatments, etc);  and high-quality skin care lines like SkinCeuticals. Shout out to my Advanced Dermatology skin guru, Nurse Practitioner Kellie Thoth! See you again in 2 months!😉 -#RealtorOnTheRun

name: Howard Sutherland
text: I was very pleased with my visit on July 10, 2020. I was glad I was able to get in the same day I called. Everyone was very professional and courteous.

text: Great group and wonderful PA!

name: Jayson Shafer
text: The Dr. spent a good bit of time with Talking to me about my options.  I’m a very complicated cervical  injury patient  I  do everything possible to you take care of myself.  I believe  Dr Durkin Could understand that even in our first visit. I appreciate his straightforward approach.

name: Starr Whittington
text: These people are awesome!! Dr. Walker and her associates are So devoted to their patients . When I started going to them I could barely walk but now with their devoted experience I'm walking . This facility is unique.  I would recommend these drs to anyone that really wants to get better and have less pain.

name: Charles Osborne
text: Very informative on my consultation visit to know what my treatment will intel

name: buddy james
text: Being my first experience  at Dynamic pain and wellness , I was very much Impressed with everyone and how polite and respectful  they were. The Doctor seemed very much concerned with my diagnosis  and scheduling me for immediate future care . I feel that I have made the right choice by coming to Dynamic I thank you very much.

name: Terry Johnson
text:
A professional and friendly atmosphere.
The Physicians are knowledgeable and there to do the best they can to help you.
They're very efficient, you're in and out.

name: heart
text: I am so grateful for the care and compassion of, Dr. Durkin and staff! I truly felt cared for.

name: Jenny Henson
text: My boyfriend an a friend goes here nice people clean place

name: Ivy Dodd
text: The staff are the most adoring people and are most respectful. Waiting time has improved tremendously.

name: Chris Orso
text: Great staff... HOWEVER... I've been on the same pain medication(percocet) for 3 years, prescribed by them. That's the ONLY narcotic I've taken in that time. And on 3 separate occasions they tell me my drug screen came back with morphine in my system. And another time, codeine. THAT'S COMPLETEY FALSE!!!! And there's no disputing it nor will they allow to do an on the spot drug to prove such. So now I'm out pain medicine because of their faulty lab practices. Youre better off going ANYWHERE  than this quack of an office!

name: Chase Nelson
text: Fraud and unethical practice. Upon information and belief, I’d encourage any current or former patient, or representative of a patient to file a complaint with the state board, insurance company and any other legal avenues against this group. The DEA should investigate allegations of insurance fraud and other medical malpractices.

name: Jennie Washington
text: The staff here is sickening, new patient and they don’t help you understand what is going on are what is needed they expect you to just know, they all stand around on social media not speaking are even communicating with the patients. Only reason they got a star is because that’s the only way to write a review it’s sad to say you be better off somewhere else. The dr is not friendly and he seems as if he is in a rush this clinic is unprofessional and I will not be back.

name: Donna Fornoff
text: They have been extremely nice to me as well as seem legitimately concerned about my pain

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback!

name: Willie Williams
text: Unorganized, unprofessional and rude. Probably one of, if not the worst places I’ve ever been. Overheard the staff discussing another patients history as well as their “I think he’s an addict” comment. Patient privacy is a joke here. They flat out lied about Dr. Hall being on vacation just so they could sign up all his patients without them knowing he was leaving. Dynamic pain and wellness is more of a pain than wellness. Do not go here, it’s all about the money to them.

name: Marie
text: I was going here when Dr hall was here last year and the name was not the same I loved it then but every since docter Hall left this place is a joke  he had me on 3 pills a day 7.5 that work just fine for a year they come in and start changing it first they went down to three  5 which I said was not working to good so the next month they took me to only two 5mg a day I missed so much work so when I went back I drop them like they like to drop ppl I told them I no longer wanted to be seen by them and I call my docter to see about sending me else where this folks or a joke

name: Randy
text: This New Main Doctor Had A Clinic In Florida And Because of Fraud With Some  Insurance Companies Are  Reasons why The Insurance companies Will Not Approve Paitents To Be Seen!!! They Say You Have Been Approved And Give you the APPOINTMENT Date And Time THEY Call You 1 DAY before you supposed to be there to say YOU ARE NOT Approved? Not Good at NOTHING BUT Delaying YOU for Meds And Upcoming SURGERY!!! LEFT HAND Doesn't Know What the Other Hand Is Doing 3 months of Misleading Someone who is Trying to Get Another SURGUERY Done Over By ORTHOPAEDIC surgeon!! Review the Internet the Whole True Story is Posted You Don't have to Take My Word for the Truth!!

name: Janetta Pogue
text: This facility is so unorganized and unprofessional.   Appointments were scheduled on top of another,  chaos and confusion.   It's a straight money grab.
